EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in SpringOne Platform 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thanks for your interest in SpringOne Platform 2018! We’ll be sure to keep you posted on all things SpringOne Platform including early registration, relevant deadlines, and new content planned for the 2018 show.
To hear how our customers are using Pivotal to transform how the world builds software, check out the recorded sessions <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ2uPeB0bByiIUMLVAhrPHL]]> from 2017’s SpringOne Platform conference; they cover a wide range of topics from Cloud-Native Architectures, to Java, Data Microservices, DevOps, and much more.
We hope you to see you at SpringOne Platform 2018!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
